comments.body: Would it be possible to remove resourcePrefix from the cacher as well? That doesn't seem like something the caching layer should need to know

it is possible I feel. 

But can we try to do that in another pull request? It requires more thought. My general feeling was the cacher is a little bit complicated right now. I am trying to simplify it or at least make it easier to read.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +38,42 @@		Versioner:      etcdstorage.APIObjectVersioner{},
		Type:           objectType,
		ResourcePrefix: resourcePrefix,
		NewListFunc:    newListFunc,
	}
